sense.def:
Norms
so oblike vedenja, ki v neki družbi veljajo kot normalne.

seg.quote: ...the conventional norms of polite European society.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je neko stanje
the norm
, pomeni, da je običajno in pričakovano.

seg.quote: In Russia, working wives have been the norm for many years.
